word_mean_info__list.difference: 指成对并且分前后的东西的“后面的”。
可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
指一物同它物相对的位置或场所。
作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。

word_group.brief_definition: 落后；在后面很远；远远落后于
在后台；在幕后；秘密地；不公开地
蹲班房, 被监禁, 坐牢
落后于时代, 过时, 老式
处于不利地位；处于劣势
幕后操纵者；垂帘听政者

bilingual.target: 我们后面的男孩是丹尼尔。

yingyinNormal.en: She left a lot behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她留下了一大堆东西

yingyinNormal.en: What about the girl behind the counter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那店员小姐呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I wouldn't leave you behind, Dr. Brand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会丢下你的，Brand博士。

yingyinNormal.en: Suzy and Emily are hiding behind the bush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西和艾米丽藏到了灌木丛中。

yingyinNormal.en: Great. He can get in line behind that guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，他可以排在那人后面。

yingyinNormal.en: He wanted people to know who was behind it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他想让大家知道幕后功臣是谁。

yingyinNormal.en: You were following orders. I left him behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们是在听从命令，我把他丢下了。

yingyinNormal.en: All the more reason to leave it behind, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那更有理由把它留在家里了，不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You said you were gonna leave this life behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说过要告别过去那种生活。

yingyinNormal.en: I left him behind. No. No. We all left together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把他丢下了。不，不，我们都把他丢下了。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, you win, I'll leave my fanny pack behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你赢了，我不带腰包就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: We both said that we were leaving the life behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都说过这话。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not gonna work, Scar. I've put it behind me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说这些都没有用，刀疤，我已经把它遗忘了。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright. Sir, who's behind all this? Aamir Barkawi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个幕后主使是谁？哈密尔·巴卡维。

yingyinNormal.en: Then they remembered all the treasures he left behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后，他们想起了他留下的宝物。

yingyinNormal.en: But we've still behind Danny's lorry. Hello, welcome back!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们仍然在丹妮的货车后面。你们好，欢迎回来！

yingyinNormal.en: And Troy and his basketball robots are obviously behind it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特洛伊和他的篮球队员明显是幕后主谋。

yingyinNormal.en: The annihilator? Behind the mask, industrialists. Reed Exworthy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 消灭者? 在那面具背后，是企业家，里德·埃克斯沃斯。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're a little behind on your bills. Everybody gets behind on their bills.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不就欠了点费吗，谁不欠费啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm right behind you. Off with his head! I can't watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就在你后面。砍下他的头！我看不下去了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 落后; 拖欠; 积压

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 落后; 拖欠; 积压

examination_example.sentence: There is often much housework left <highlight>behind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经常有许多家务活落在后面。

examination_example.sentence: It is the masses beneath them that are left <highlight>behind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 落后的是他们下面的群众。

examination_example.sentence: Lag <highlight>behind</highlight> the others due to decreased opportunities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于机会减少而落后于其他人。

sense_info_list.en: guiding, controlling, or responsible for (an event or plan)

examination_example.sentence: Biological factors <highlight>behind</highlight> eye contact are being investigated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们正在研究眼神交流背后的生物因素。

examination_example.sentence: He found the foresight <highlight>behind</highlight> the establishment of the SBoRE to be novel, unique and likely to have a lasting impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现建立SBoRE背后的远见卓识是新颖的、独特的，并且可能会产生持久的影响。

examination_example.sentence: The new awards are an exercise in self-promotion for those <highlight>behind</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新奖项是为背后的人自我宣传的一种方式。

sense_info_list.en: at or toward the back of somebody or something;

examination_example.sentence: Our mental health doesn't really go anywhere; like the sun <highlight>behind</highlight> a cloud.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的心理健康并没有任何进展；就像云后的太阳。

examination_example.sentence: What is it that makes us feel we need to hide <highlight>behind</highlight> our screens?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么让我们觉得需要躲在屏幕后面？

sense_info_list.en: responsible for starting or developing something
in the place where sb / sth is or was
used to say that something is in somebody's past

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in, to, or toward the back

examination_example.sentence: "I think this is the beginning," says Travis Cloyd, CEO of Worldwide XR, one of the companies <highlight>behind</highlight> the digital recreation of Dean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我认为这是开始，”Dean数字娱乐的幕后公司之一Worldwide XR的首席执行官Travis Cloyd说。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi's biography is also a story about choices and the motivations <highlight>behind</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi的传记也是一个关于选择及其背后动机的故事。

examination_example.sentence: Tim Webber is at UK visual effects firm Framestore, the company <highlight>behind</highlight> the Hepburn chocolate ad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂姆·韦伯是赫本巧克力广告背后的公司，英国视觉特效公司Framestore的。

sense_info_list.en: not up to the general level

examination_example.sentence: That the UK lags <highlight>behind</highlight> is due to our weak, local government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国发展落后是我们软弱的地方政府所导致的。

examination_example.sentence: Even parents may well feel guilt that their child is left <highlight>behind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使父母们也会为自己的孩子落在后面而感到内疚。

examination_example.sentence: If you've ever started a sentence with, "If I were you... ", there's a scientific reason <highlight>behind</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你曾经用过“如果我是你 ...”开头的句子，这是有科学根据的。

word_usage.usage:
from behind意为“从后面”。
示例：He was shot from behind. 
他后背中了弹。

behind表“留于身后或原地”时，常与leave, stay, remain等动词连用。
示例：This bag was left behind after the class.
这个书包是有人下课后落下的。

behind表“当某人已通过…之后”解时，常与close, shut等动词连用。
示例：I walked out and closed the door behind me.
我走了出来，随手带上了门。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要是指时间的先后次序。
强调物体静态位置的前后 There are many trees behind the house.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in; to; or toward the back

examination_example.sentence: There does appear to be some psychology <highlight>behind</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这背后似乎有一些心理因素。

examination_example.sentence: Only people who were seated in the same row as a passenger with the flu — or one row in front of or <highlight>behind</highlight> that individual 一 had a high risk of catching the illness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有与患流感的乘客同坐一排，或者坐在患者前面或后面一排的人才会有较高的感染疾病的风险。

examination_example.sentence: Passengers sitting one row in front of or <highlight>behind</highlight> this individual, had about an 80 percent chance of getting sick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坐在此人前一排或后一排的乘客，生病的几率大约是80%。

sense_info_list.en: not up to the general level

examination_example.sentence: Campaigners have warned that the British government is not doing enough to prevent left-handed pupils from falling <highlight>behind</highlight> their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 活动人士警告说，在防止左撇子学生落后于同龄人方面，英国政府做得不够。

他后背中了弹。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要是指时间的先后次序。
强调物体静态位置的前后 There are many trees behind the house.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in, to, or toward the back

examination_example.sentence: Seconds later, our lizard emerged from its tank with its old skin flowing <highlight>behind</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几秒后，蜥蜴从水箱里钻了出来，蜕下的皮在身后漂着。

examination_example.sentence: I realized that we have to learn to leave the past <highlight>behind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我意识到我们必须学会放下过去。

examination_example.sentence: Music could also be helping you with many other health problems <highlight>behind</highlight> the scenes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 音乐还可以帮你解决许多其他隐藏在背后的健康问题。

examination_example.sentence: We hope that our work will help with technological solutions (解决方案) to ensure that older drivers stay safer <highlight>behind</highlight> the wheel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望我们的工作将有助于技术解决方案，以确保高龄驾驶人员在驾驶时更加安全。

sense_info_list.en: not up to the general level

examination_example.sentence: The fear of falling <highlight>behind</highlight> in efficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对效率落后感到的恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: Code breaking never lags (落后) far <highlight>behind</highlight> code making.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 代码破解从来不会远远落后于代码编写。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 向后; 在后面; 在...背后; 幕后
(遗留)在后; (留)在原处; 在...身后

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在后台；在幕后；秘密地；不公开地

sense_info_list.zh: 向后; 在后面; 在...背后; 幕后

examination_example.sentence: And they were even more excited after learning about the stories and culture <highlight>behind</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在了解了背后的故事和文化后，他们更加兴奋了。

examination_example.sentence: She also bought a meal for the person standing in line <highlight>behind</highlight> her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她还为站在她身后排队的人买了一顿饭。

examination_example.sentence: One day after watching a science program, a little boy decided to dig a hole <highlight>behind</highlight> his house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有天，一个小男孩在看完科学节目后决定在他的房子后面挖一个洞。

sense_info_list.en: in a particular place after leaving or after others have moved on; after the departure or death of somebody
sense_info_list.zh: (遗留)在后; (留)在原处; 在...身后

examination_example.sentence: He didn't leave valuable things <highlight>behind</highlight>, but he was a kind loving father, and left <highlight>behind</highlight> his best love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有留下值钱的东西，但他是一个慈爱的父亲，他留下了他最好的爱。

examination_example.sentence: However, the dog was surprisingly left <highlight>behind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这只狗却出人意料地被抛在了后面。

examination_example.sentence: The left-<highlight>behind</highlight> children can't see their parents often
examination_example.sentence_trans: 留守儿童不能经常见到他们的父母。

sense_info_list.en: not up to the general level

examination_example.sentence: If you're a slow learner, you can fall <highlight>behind</highlight> in regular school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你学得比较慢，你在普通学校会落后。

examination_example.sentence: The boy fell <highlight>behind</highlight>, so he had to run to catch up with his father.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个男孩落后了，所以他必须跑着追赶他的父亲。

examination_example.sentence: The kids were very happy but a bit worried﹣they were <highlight>behind</highlight> in their studies．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些孩子们很开心但也有点担忧，因为他们落下很多功课。

examination_example.sentence: "Come on Mass, we are all <highlight>behind</highlight> you."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加油Mass，我们都支持你。

word_usage.usage:
from behind意为“从后面”。
示例：He was shot from behind. 
他后背中了弹。

behind表“留于身后或原地”时，常与leave, stay, remain等动词连用。
示例：This bag was left behind after the class.
这个书包是有人下课后落下的。

behind表“当某人已通过…之后”解时，常与close, shut等动词连用。
示例：I walked out and closed the door behind me.
我走了出来，随手带上了门。
